subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 33 saves and Jay Pandolfo and Brian Rafalski scored for the Devils last night in a 2-1 victory against the Canadiens in Coach Claude Julien’s return to Montreal.
snippet: Martin Brodeur made 33 saves and Jay Pandolfo and Brian Rafalski scored for the Devils last night in a 2-1 victory against the Canadiens in Coach Claude Julien’s return to Montreal.
